name: Vidisha Shah
desc: A passionate web developer with a keen interest in enhancing Developer Experience, embracing Open Source, and delving into the endless potential of Artificial Intelligence. My goal is to support fellow developers, and create with a user-centric approach.
subheading: Crafting digital experiences, one commit at a time, from Nuremberg, Germany.
about: Creative Full-Stack Web Developer | Skilled in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJs, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js. Committed to delivering high-quality codeand optimizing performance. Let's collaborate and create remarkable digitalsolutions.
subheading4: Explore some of my handcrafted projects, meticulously coded from inception to completion.

projects.title: Curriculum Builder
projects.description: Curriculum Builder is a full stack application. User can build their CVs online by using our application. The user experience includes real-time preview features. Project has been created with React Js, Node Js, Express Js, Mongo DB and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: The Dream Holiday Apartment
projects.description: The Dream Holiday Apartment is utilized to oversee the administrative section of the website. It is is built with React Js. We have utilized react-bootstrap and Bootstrap dependencies for styling.

projects.title: Angry Bird Shooting Game
projects.description: Angry Bird Shooting Game is web based shooting game. Project has been created with plain HTML, Javascript and CSS.
